article.title: Northrop Grumman Provides Hunter UAS Logistic Services
article.text: Northrop Grumman Technical Services, Sierra Vista, Ariz., was awarded a $20,236,014 modification (P00020) to contract W58RGZ-13-C-0010 for contractor logistic services for the Hunter unmanned aircraft system (UAS). Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
